name: Look Away
description:
Like any other day you make your way into the city, but today you decided to try a new look, something that represents you better. You feel anxious as you walk through the busy streets on your journey, catching lingering glances from passing strangers.

You make your way down into the subway, and board the train...

Game by Baylee Windebank
2D Animation by Courtney Reilly
UI Design by Naomi
